          11 Egg-ceptional Ideas for a Hopping Easter in Singapore 2022

          Posted on April 6, 2022November 25, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          Hoppy Easter, everybunny!

          Easter’s coming up so very soon now – 17th April 2022 – and what there’s nothing more Easter than some hopping crafts, cracking egg hunts and most importantly, egg-cellent chocolates! The Easter Bunny has some work to do, so let’s get into the Easter spirit with some egg-ceptional activities and Easter goodies! We’ve compiled a list of ideas for you with this egg-sential guide to Easter in Singapore 2022!

          P.S. I have so many egg puns, it’s not even bunny.

          Contents hide
          Easter Egg-tivities
          1. Egg Hunt at Jurong Bird Park
          2. Spot a Deliveroo Easter Bunny
          3. Be Alice-in-Easterland
          4. Spring Egg-stravaganza
          5. Easter Art Workshop at CocoArt SG
          Easter Treats
          6. Godiva
          7. Laurent Bernard
          8. Anjalichocolat
          9. Venchi
          10. See’s Candies
          11. Leela’s Fine Chocolates
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          Easter Egg-tivities

          1. Egg Hunt at Jurong Bird Park

          Source: Mandai via website

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.mandai.com/en/jurong-bird-park/

          Address: 2 Jurong Hill, Singapore 628925

          When: 1 April – 3 May 2022, 8:30am-6pm

          Have a whimsical Easter at Jurong Bird Park’s Easter Wonderland! Here, you and your kids can search for eggs in their annual Easter Egg Hunt (and maybe find that elusive golden egg, perhaps?), and make your own masterpieces of creativity. Jurong Bird Park’s egg-sploding with egg-citing Easter activities! Explore the Easter Egg-chanted Forest and try to escape the Whimsical Wonderland Maze. And if you manage to make your way out, try your hand at some arts and crafts at the Feathered Friends’ Forest Workshop, Easter Hat-ivity and the Build-a-Basket Craft. It’s non-stop fun for the whole family!

          Check out the website for more details and the timings for each activity.

          2. Spot a Deliveroo Easter Bunny

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://deliveroo.com.sg/

          When: 15-17 April 2022

          Take part in an IRL Easter hunt this year! Rather than looking for colourful eggs, keep a vigilant lookout for the elusive Deliveroo Easter Bunnies! Deliveroo’s friendly riders will be out and about dressed up in Easter bunny masks, ears and even a fluffy little tail! And that’s not even the best part! Spot a “Deliveroo Bunny” and share a pic on their Facebook for a chance to win $20 worth of Deliveroo credits!

          3. Be Alice-in-Easterland

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.thetiarasociety.com/

          Address: 902 East Coast Parkway, Singapore 449874

          When: 15-17 April 2022, 9am-10am | 10am-11am

          This year, The Tiara Society brings you a magical Easter in Singapore with their Alice-in-Easterland event! So, like Alice, hop down the rabbit hole into Easterland and embrace the crazy, unusual, almost magical atmosphere! That’s not enough immersion? You can even meet-and-greet the White Rabbit, the Cheshire Cat and the Red Queen! Search for eggs in the outdoor egg hunt, play traditional Easter games and indulge in delicious Easter treats. So, what are you doing? Come along with Alice, there are adventures waiting!

          4. Spring Egg-stravaganza

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://citysprouts.com.sg/spring-eggstravaganza

          Address: 102 Henderson Road, Singapore 159562

          When: 17 April 2022, 9am-12pm

          Experience an eco-Easter this year with City Sprouts’ Spring Egg-stravaganza! Venture out into the farms where you can visit the community farm and get an exclusive look into greenhouses. And not only that, but you and your kids can learn more about sustainability and the 3Rs and welcome “spring”!

          Unfortunately, the Meet the Quail and Egg Pouch Decoration activities are sold out, but there are still so many other things to do! From Bingo Egg Hunts to Egg Rolling Races and Carnival Egg Tosses, from Cork Bunny Keychain Making to Colourful Spring Egg Trees, there’s plenty to make this day amazing. Feeling the heat? Get free ice cream from Uncle’s traditional ice cream cart! You’ll have an egg-straordinary day with City Sprouts this Easter in Singapore!

          For more egg-citing things to do, check out City Sprouts’ other Easter workshops!

          5. Easter Art Workshop at CocoArt SG

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.cocoart.sg/

          Address: 41 Beach Rd, Singapore 189680

          When: 28 March – 15 April 2022 | 10am-12pm | 3pm-5pm

          Let your little Easter bunnies hop wild with some egg-cellent Easter art workshops! CocoArt SG has a different workshop for every day of the week! Begin your week off on Mondays with Easter egg relief printing while Tuesdays are the day to make egg and chick clay trinkets. Next, spend hump day decorating Easter eggs with splashes of colour that’ll show off your kid’s personality and then paint a beautiful bunny on canvas on Thursday. And finally, end the week off with some cotton bunny painting! Easter celebrations are a great way to get people out of their shells!

          Easter Treats

          Fill your house (and your stomach!) with delicious chocolatey treats like Easter eggs and Easter Bunny chocolates. Here’s where you can find your treats this Easter in Singapore.

          6. Godiva

          Source: Godiva via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.godiva.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Godiva’s one of the most well-known chocolatiers with a history of providing premium chocolate worldwide. So celebrate Easter with a little bit of luxury with Godiva! There are even cute boxes shaped like spring flowers and Easter bunnies! Plus, all that glitters may not be gold, but sometimes it can be a sparkly sequin covered Easter Egg collectible, filled with delicious chocolates. Those Easter eggs are really to dye for.

          P.S. There’s a special promotion running from now until 18th April 2022! Buy 2 or more to get 20% off of selected items!

          7. Laurent Bernard

          Source: Laurent Bernard via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.laurentbernard.com.sg/easter.html

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Are you looking for delicately crafted chocolates with rich flavours that will leave you desiring more? Well, look no further than Laurent Bernard! Besides creating quality, scrumptious chocolates on a daily, they also have a fully fledged Easter collection! There’s hopping Easter Bunnies (wrapped and in baskets) and eggceptional Easter Eggs; you can also find the adorable Chicken Benedicte, Chicken Little and Chicken Lulu! Ring in Easter with a Chocolate Bell!

          8. Anjalichocolat

          Source: Anjalichocolat via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here 

          Website: https://www.anjalichocolat.com/

          Address: 163 Tanglin Road, Singapore 247933

          Operating Hours: Daily, 10am-6pm

          Anjalichocolat is an artisan chocolatier providing fresh, luxurious chocolates that you will definitely salivate over. This Easter in Singapore, they have the cutest Easter Eggs – in mini, small, medium and large sizes – and even a children’s Easter Basket gift hamper for a delicious treat! And you won’t believe how cute the chocolate animals are! Anjalichocolat have an assortment of Easter Bunnies, of course, in different sizes, but there’s even more… Celebrate Easter this year with adorable Easter Chickens and Easter Hens! How cute is that?

          9. Venchi

          Source: Venchi via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.venchi.sg/easter-collection

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Daily, 11am-9pm

          Venchi celebrates the beauty of chocolates with their Easter collection! Choose your poison: dark, milk or while chocolates! Classic or hazelnuts? Almonds, pistachios, raspberries? Are you more interested in soft chocolate Easter bunnies or the teensiest mini eggs?  They may be small, but they’re delicious with every bite. Even those who don’t like heavy chocolates can find something in the milk chocolates with 70% less sugar. It’s a colourful explosion of taste your taste buds will forever love!

          10. See’s Candies

          Source: See’s Candies via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.sees.com/easter-candy

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          See’s Candies has a large and diverse collection of Easter goodies! From Easter eggs to gift sets to treasure baskets, tins and collections that will leave all of you chocoholics drooling, there’s something for everyone to savour this Easter in Singapore! Explore their chocolate eggs with delicately hand-decorated flowers for a colourful addition! Not a fan of chocolates? Get your sweet tooth (or is it a sour tooth?) fixed with some fun jelly beans shaped like beans, eggs and bunnies!

          11. Leela’s Fine Chocolates

          Source: Leela’s Fine Chocolates via website

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here 

          Website: http://leelaschocolates.com/easter/

          Handmade from the finest European couverture chocolate, Leela’s Chocolates has got your Easter treats needs covered! Get your chocolate Easter eggs, bunnies, ducks and lambs for some delectable bites! And it’s not just regular chocolates that you can pop into your mouth! Get Easter Egg and Bunny Lollipops for a little something different. Order them from Leela’s now to have a very chocolatey Easter in Singapore 2022!

          Conclusion

          And there you have it! It’s all about the simple pleasures in life, so enjoy a day of good fun (and yummy treats!) this Easter 2022, here in Singapore! Easter celebrations are a great way to get people out of their shells. Who else is egg-cited? 

          But, after everything, all of this celebrating is eggs-hausting. Take a break and hop on over to some of our other articles to discover what else you can do over your Easter weekend in Singapore!
